title: 7 TP summoners taken in one game at MSI Finals Game 1

replies.body: Meanwhile 10 Flashes in every competitive game yet no one cares. The bias.

I have LONG wanted flash removed from the game. (as a summoner)

A purchased item a la DOTA would be fine in my book, since someone would have to invest in their get-out-of-jail card.

This game has far too many get-out-of-jail cards already.
Honestly the game would be much more exciting if everyone had access to a teleport, maybe turret-only, similar to Dota.
I'd be okay with this as long as they had to buy it too.
since i haven't been playing much lately, can you or someone explain the reasoning behind both adcs taking tp?

Just gangbangs, really.

Its novelty wears off after the first 4-5 man dive on the Tier-1.

Edit:

They're just running 6 tanks (across all 10 players) and gangbanging. It's just...meh.

> [{quoted}](name=Too Unlucky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=z5QEnhZH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-20T11:25:43.590+0000)
>
> since i haven't been playing much lately, can you or someone explain the reasoning behind both adcs taking tp?

Free back for items without downtime. If one takes it and the other doesn't then they are likely to lose lane.
